summary: I found it to be a nuisance to have to carry a pickaxe taking up my carryweight all the time, so I made a mod to make it weightless. Figured I'd upload it since I've seen other people annoyed with it~
descriptionHtml:
I found it to be a nuisance to have to carry a pickaxe taking up my carryweight all the time, so I made a mod to make it weightless. Figured I'd upload it since I've seen other people annoyed with it~

This affects ALL the pickaxes in Skyrim, and since I have now acquired the Dragonborn DLC, it makes the Ancient Nordic Pickaxe This may or may not seem lore-friendly to you. I'll tick off the box anyway. I prefer lore-friendly myself, but maybe you're like me and just couldn't stand to be lugging a heavy pickaxe around all the time~

Also, I can do simple mods like these so feel free to make requests ^.^
author: BroMeese
